trans-unit.source: Defines methods that decrypt an XrML <see langword="<encryptedGrant>" /> element.
trans-unit.target: Define métodos que descriptografam um elemento XrML <see langword="<encryptedGrant>" />.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.IRelDecryptor> interface with the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlLicenseTransform> class to decrypt an XrML `<encryptedGrant>` element.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.IRelDecryptor> interface com o <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlLicenseTransform> classe para descriptografar um XrML `<encryptedGrant>` elemento.

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to validate an XML digital signature using the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.IRelDecryptor> interface and the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlLicenseTransform> class.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir mostra como validar uma assinatura digital XML usando o <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.IRelDecryptor> interface e o <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlLicenseTransform> classe.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionMethod" /> object that encapsulates the algorithm used for XML encryption.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionMethod" /> que encapsula o algoritmo usado para a criptografia XML.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfo" /> object that contains an asymmetric key to use for decryption.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfo" /> que contém uma chave assimétrica a ser usada para descriptografia.

trans-unit.source: A stream object that contains an <see langword="<encryptedGrant>" /> element to decrypt.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto de fluxo que contém um elemento <see langword="<encryptedGrant>" /> a descriptografar.

trans-unit.source: Decrypts an XrML <see langword="<encryptedGrant>" /> element that is contained within a <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Descriptografa um elemento XrML <see langword="<encryptedGrant>" /> que está contido dentro de um objeto <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> object that contains a decrypted <see langword="<encryptedGrant>" /> element.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> que contém um elemento <see langword="<encryptedGrant>" /> descriptografado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.IRelDecryptor.Decrypt%2A> method decrypts an XrML `<encryptedGrant>` element and returns a plaintext stream.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.IRelDecryptor.Decrypt%2A> método descriptografa uma XrML `<encryptedGrant>` elemento e retorna um fluxo de texto sem formatação.
